overview: I am interested in producing quality, maintainable software.

experience.title: VP of Engineering (Current)
experience.description: When I started working at RTRS, I was the only developer, a freelancer, and my hours were capped at seven per week due to funding.  Almost four years later, I am on staff and we are doing business with Fortune 500 companies. I lead a team of engineers spanning mobile, web, and backend.
accomplishments: I focus heavily on API security of a multirole, multitenant application.
Wrote over 1000 integration/unit tests for Django/DRF.
Automated deployments and code quality checks using Github Actions.
